sense.def: Alternative Names jiao long zheng 蛟龍症 , flood dragon condition. Pathological Condition with blue hands and abdominal fullness and an unbearable pain. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Lj: 春 秋二時，龍帶精入芹菜中，人偶食之為病。發時手青腹滿，痛不可忍， 名蛟龍病 , “In the two seasons of spring and autumn, dragons place their essence/semen into celery. If a person happens to consume such plants, this will result in blue hands and abdominal fullness, and unbearable pain. It is called ‘ flood - dragon disease ’”. LSZ refutes the claim that flood dragons can deposit their essence/semen in celery plants, and wonders whether this could be semen of lizards or snakes.
